name: June's Tale
description:
June's Tale is a 3D side-scrolling action-adventure game that follows Elder’s apprentice June as she bravely searches for weapons to defeat her enemy The One Dragon, who has stolen her partner's soul. 

Players must explore, collect items, and battle enemies and bosses to find all the 3 things that June needs: The Dash Boots, The Biggest Staff, and The Energy Shield.

CONTROLS:

A or D - Walk Left or Right
S - Down
Space - Jump
Double A or D - Dash
Left Mouse - Attack
Hold Left Mouse - Staff Explosion Attack
Right Mouse - Use Energy Shield
Escape - Toggle Menu

SOUNDS & MUSIC: 
  •  Background sound created by Quiet Word Machine 
  •  Incompleted FX sounds
EXTERNAL ASSETS:
